text: Sevan Football Club (), formerly Junior Sevan Football Club, is a football club based in Sevan, Gegharkunik Province, Armenia. They have won one Armenian First League title, in their debut season in 2018–19. ==History== Sevan Football Club was founded in 2018 as Junior Sevan Football Club, in the town of Sevan, Gegharkunik Province. In its first year of foundation, Junior Sevan applied and took part in the Armenian First League. Even though it won the 2018–19 league season, the club was not granted a license for promotion to the Premier League for not having met the required standards. On 25 June, the club announced that the name was changed to Sevan FC. ===League and cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #F9F9F9; border: 2px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- ! rowspan="2" | Season ! colspan="10" | League ! rowspan="2" | National Cup ! colspan="2" | Top goalscorer |- !
